Job Posting:167701 - Position: S25 Quality Assurance Engineer Internship 167701B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 03/14/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 03/07/2025 10:51 AM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization DataVisor JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Salary Range $ Job Description 2025 - Summer S25 Quality Assurance Engineer Internship 167701B Co-op Position Remote Canada 4 months Fully Remote CAD 0.0 per hour for 0 Major List $18-23/hour Please note that this position is contingent on funding. DataVisor is the world's leading AI-powered Fraud and Risk Platform that delivers the best overall detection coverage in the industry. With an open SaaS platform that supports easy consolidation and enrichment of any data, DataVisor's solution scales infinitely and enables organizations to act on fast-evolving fraud and money laundering activities in real-time. Its patented unsupervised machine learning technology, advanced device intelligence, powerful decision engine, and investigation tools work together to provide guaranteed performance lift from day one. DataVisor's platform is architected to support multiple use cases across different business units flexibly, dramatically lowering the total cost of ownership, compared to legacy point solutions. DataVisor is recognized as an industry leader and has been adopted by many Fortune 500 companies across the globe. Our award-winning software platform is powered by a team of world-class experts in big data, machine learning, security, and scalable infrastructure. Our culture is open, positive, collaborative, and results-driven. Come join us! We are looking for self-driven students currently enrolled in a post-secondary program majoring in Computer Science/Computing, information management, or related fields, who can constantly challenge themselves and surpass themselves. This internship offers the opportunity to gain hands-on engineering experience in front-end framework, quality assurance, automation framework. Responsibility: • According to product design or requirements, conduct requirement analysis, design and execute test cases • Help to improve the product user experience • Work with product manager, development engineers and project manager to solve the problem on time • Maintain and optimize the existing automation framework • Assist in building the interface of automation framework Design, implement and maintain automated test code • Job Requirements Requirements • Current Co-op students or students enrolled in a post-secondary program (BS or MS) who are majoring in computer science, information management, or a related field of Canada Canada-based college or university. • Canadian citizen, permanent resident, or person with refugee protection given under the law and legal bale to work in Canada according to the laws and regulations of the province or territory where you live. • 1-2 years of Java experience • Strong communication and interpersonal skills. • Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Detail-oriented and intellectually curious. • Citizenship Requirement Canadian & Permanent Residents & Refugees Only APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Optional Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://apply.workable.com/datavisor-jobs/j/469C715A46/ Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
